scripts.build: mkdir -p ./build/ && rm -rf ./dist/* ./build/* && em++ ./src/cpp/main.cpp -o ./build/optimizer.js -s MODULARIZE=1 -s 'EXPORT_NAME="createModule"' --bind -s ENVIRONMENT=web && parcel build src/index.html && cp ./build/*.wasm ./dist/ && touch dist/.nojekyll
scripts.build-gh-pages: mkdir -p ./build/ && rm -rf ./dist/* ./build/* && em++ ./src/cpp/main.cpp -o ./build/optimizer.js -s MODULARIZE=1 -s 'EXPORT_NAME="createModule"' --bind -s ENVIRONMENT=web && parcel build --public-url /social_golfer_timetabling/ src/index.html && cp ./build/*.wasm ./dist/ && touch dist/.nojekyll
scripts.deploy: git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
